message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR, cs.HC, cs.SI. 

The paper deals with online learning and bandit problems, which are typically studied in the machine learning and artificial intelligence communities (cs.LG, cs.AI). The focus on user preferences and the need to personalize the learning process suggests a connection to information retrieval (cs.IR) and human-computer interaction (cs.HC). Finally, the use of statistical models and analysis techniques may also relate to the field of social and information networks (cs.SI).
